DOC.brief_title: Cutting Balloon Versus Non-cutting Balloon Treatment Venous Stenosis Fistulas Hemodialyzed Patients
DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 12 month followup The patient hemodialysis chronic renal insufficiency The patient 's vascular access arteriovenous fistula The patient venous stenosis fistula ( first event study zone ) The patient schedule angioplasty The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient fluently read French The patient understand French The patient pregnant The patient breastfeed Short term dialysis The vascular access `` graft '' The stenosis question recurrence , first event study zone The life expectancy patient < 12 month Medical emergency situation Peritoneal dialysis Athome dialysis
